original_text: Then the priest shall take some of the blood of the sin offering with his finger and put it on the horns of the altar of burnt offering and pour out the rest of its blood at the base of the altar of burnt offering.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 속죄 제물의 피를 손가락에 찍어 번제단 뿔들에 바르고 그 피는 번제단 밑에 쏟고

sentences.original_text: Then the priest shall take some of the blood of the sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 제사장은 속죄제물의 피를 조금 가져다가

sentences.original_text: and put it on the horns of the altar of burnt offering
and pour out the rest of its blood
sentences.korean_translation: 그 나머지 피는 쏟아야 할 것인데

sentences.original_text: at the base of the altar of burnt offering.
